summary:
Add a small campsite in riverhood, in which you can develop any thing, because it has:

-> Workbench
-> Anvil
-> Grindstone
-> Table of enchantments
-> Alchemy Lab
-> Chest
-> Barrels
-> Sleeping Bag
-> Tent
-> Table and bench
descriptionHtml:
First of all, I am Spanish and I am using the google translator, so if you see any unusual word or phrase ... blame the google translator xD

Dragon's Blood Camp

Add a small campsite in riverhood, in which you can develop any thing, because it has:

-> Workbench
-> Anvil
-> Grindstone
-> Table of enchantments
-> Alchemy Lab
-> Chest
-> Barrels
-> Sleeping Bag
-> Tent
-> Table and bench
-> Some decoration

Added a new drink as cause for celebration for my first mod!

That drink is non-alcoholic ale

Now you can drink and drink without worrying about the regeneration of stamina.

The password for the file decompression: xXchoplinatorXx

Spanish translations activated, if you want to translate the Spanish mod contact me.
author: xXchoplinatorXx
